shortBio: amii is a Nigerian girl group defined by honest storytelling and a sound that blends Afro-pop with global influences. Formed in [Year], the group explores themes of growth, identity, and shared experience. Their debut project is currently in production, marking the beginning of a new era in alternative fan connection.
